column8:
The Mercedes-Benz W196 was entered into the 1954 & 1955 Formula One seasons. Out of the 12 races it entered, it won 9 of them! It was also the first engine to use fuel injection, which was a spin-off from the Messerschmitt BF109 WW2 fighter aircraft developed by Mercedes engineers.

Famously it was driven by the most formidable driver line-up in F1 history: Juan Manuel Fangio & Stirling Moss.

A beautiful and very successful race-car.

My t-shirt design includes a cut-away diagram of the car as well as the "Monza" variant of the W196, which has covered wheel arches for improved aerodynamics, this is my favourite version of it.

 

Buy this Mercedes W196 t-shirt and join me in celebrating the maginificent machine.
